title: Clothing Cult-Favorite MAAP Launches into WorldTour with Wild Jayco-AlUla Team Kit
content:
'A long-held dream of ours': Premium Aussie brand makes long-awaited men’s and women’s WorldTour debut with love-or-hate grey shorts and plush purple jersey.

Read the full article at Clothing Cult-Favorite MAAP Launches into WorldTour with Wild Jayco-AlUla Team Kit on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
